column1: Art Institute of Chicago////They are best know for their Impressionist through Modern collections.  Even if you aren't a huge fan of this time period in art
column2: it shouldn't be missed.  Chicago houses many well know paintings such as "American Gothic" by Wood
column4: "Sunday Afternoon on La Grande Jatte" by Seurat
column5: and "Rainy Day in Paris" by Caillebotte.  You might not recognize the names
column6: but you will certainly recognize the works.  I especially like the entire room of Monet paintings and the room of surrealist works.
